trans-unit.source: Verifies that the user has permission to access the file requested.
trans-unit.target: 验证远程用户是否具有访问所请求的文件的权限。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: This module provides authorization services against file-system access-control lists (ACLs).
trans-unit.target: 此模块提供授权服务，文件系统的访问控制列表 (Acl)。

trans-unit.source: When the `mode` attribute of the [authentication Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/27bc0ba9-f23a-45f3-ae42-dbe7916e3ee2) configuration element is set to `Windows` so that the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> is being used for the application, the <xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule> module ensures that the requesting user is allowed read or write access to the resource, depending on the request verb, before executing the request.
trans-unit.target: 当`mode`属性[身份验证元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/27bc0ba9-f23a-45f3-ae42-dbe7916e3ee2)配置元素设置为`Windows`以便<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>正用于应用程序， <xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule>模块可确保，请求用户允许读取或写入访问权限的资源，具体取决于请求谓词中，在执行请求之前。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule.CheckFileAccessForUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule.CheckFileAccessForUser%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数不应从应用程序代码中调用。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET calls this constructor to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 调用此构造函数可创建的实例<xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule>类。

trans-unit.source: After calling the constructor, it calls the <xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule.Init%2A> method to initialize the new <xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule> object.
trans-unit.target: 后调用的构造函数，它调用<xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule.Init%2A>方法以初始化新<xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule>对象。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path to the file.
trans-unit.target: 文件的虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: A Windows access token representing the user.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示用户的 Windows 访问令牌。

trans-unit.source: The HTTP verb used to make the request.
trans-unit.target: 用于进行请求的 HTTP 谓词。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the user has access to the requested file.
trans-unit.target: 确定用户是否具有对所请求的文件的访问权。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current Windows user represented by <paramref name="token" /> has access to the file using the specified HTTP verb or if the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule" /> module is not defined in the application's configuration file; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果由 <paramref name="token" /> 表示的当前 Windows 用户能够使用指定 HTTP 谓词访问文件，或是如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule" /> 模块未在应用程序的配置文件中进行定义，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule.CheckFileAccessForUser%2A> method checks to see whether the current user, represented by a Windows access token, is granted access to the requested file in the file-system access-control lists (ACLs).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule.CheckFileAccessForUser%2A>方法检查以查看 Windows 访问令牌所表示的当前用户是否被授予访问权限的文件系统访问控制列表 (Acl) 中请求的文件。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path is mapped to the physical file-system path before the check is made.
trans-unit.target: 虚拟路径映射到的物理文件系统路径之前进行检查。

trans-unit.source: If the HTTP verb used to make the request is `GET`, `POST`, or `HEAD`, the <xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule.CheckFileAccessForUser%2A> method checks for read access to the file.
trans-unit.target: 用于发出请求的 HTTP 谓词是否`GET`， `POST`，或`HEAD`、<xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule.CheckFileAccessForUser%2A>方法检查文件的读取访问权限。

trans-unit.source: If any other verb is used, the <xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule.CheckFileAccessForUser%2A> method checks for read/write permission to the file.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用任何其他谓词，则<xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule.CheckFileAccessForUser%2A>方法会检查是否对文件的读/写权限。

trans-unit.source: **Security Note** If the <xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule> module is not defined in the `httpModules` configuration section for the application, the <xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule> module always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: **安全说明**如果<xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule>中未定义模块`httpModules`对应用程序的配置节<xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule>模块将始终返回`true`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="virtualPath" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="virtualPath" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="token" /> is <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="token" /> 为 <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="verb" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="verb" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="virtualPath" /> is not in the application directory structure of the Web application.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="virtualPath" /> 不在 Web 应用程序的应用程序目录结构中。

trans-unit.source: The file specified by <paramref name="virtualPath" /> does not exist.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="virtualPath" /> 指定的文件不存在。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources, other than memory, used by the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule" />.
trans-unit.target: 释放 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule" /> 使用的所有资源，内存除外。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不应从应用程序代码中调用。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplication" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 当前的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplication" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不应从应用程序代码中调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule.Init%2A> method ensures that the <xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule> is included in the processing of the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthorizeRequest> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule.Init%2A>方法可确保<xref:System.Web.Security.FileAuthorizationModule>包含在处理<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthorizeRequest>事件。
